item.title: Refineries optimization: from Data Science to Financial Engineering
item.description: Optimizing the decision-making of a strategic project under uncertainty Laying out the theoretical business case This case study demonstrates the application of various data science techniques, integrated with finance and strategic planning, to improve data-driven decision-making processes.
